How do i save an archive modified in vim ?
what do you mean a file modified with vim?
yep.. i modified the xorg.conf and i want to save it..
hit esc they type :   then w  to write then q to quit
it says it is in readonly
you need to edit it using sudo
so you would do sudo vim /etc/X11/xorg.conf or sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf  that way you can write the file since you need root to do it.
